column9: A great Italian inspired concept with several facilitites around Skåne. The restaurant in Lund is the smaller format CASA. It serves lunch and dinner. The menu holds antipasti, pizzas, salads, pastas and desserts. Our 10 year old totally loved the pizzas! The pizzas are thin...More

The food here is great, and the service is usually also very good. The problem is that the sound level is way too high due to the total lack of textiles or anything else that absorbs the sound. Another minus is that the tables are...More

If you like Italian thin base pizza, then you cannot get much better than here.

Good choice of pizza toppings. I actually had a few extras on mine.

The salads are large and very good, especially the Salmon salad.

Really nice service and their Salmon salad is gorgeous. It's near the central station i Lund and on a quiet street.

I didn't enjoy the pizza here at all - it was very oily and overwhelming, felt sick after eating less than half of my portion. Prices were very high; they even charged for the water! You could get something better for 60kr in other places...More

column7: Way too pricey for what you get
column9: Experience was not great at all. Charged 10 crowns per person for one jug of water and food was not the greatest given the price. A lot of better, cheaper and fairer options in Lund you can go instead.

Nice, crispy pizzas. There is a wide variety of pizza offer, and you can always find something for your taste. Pastas are not that creative and tasty, so I would skip them. Also I didn't like the fact that they charge for tap water and...More

Ate there after a whole day of traveling. Food was delicious the bruschetta entre could have had more tasting tomatoes though. My pizza was excellent and my friends pasta was also great! I really recommend going there.

column7: Feel like having a tasty pizza? Go to Vespa.
column9:
I've visited the restaurant many times during more than 3 years.

Pizza was excellent as I remembered, quite close to pizza I've had in Italy
Service was fast and friendly
Don't let the construction nearby put you off, still a great atmospher
